title: Top Places to visit in Silapathar, Assam
content: Silapathar is a city in Dhemaji district in the Indian state of Assam. The city is situated on the northern bank of the Brahmaputra River and is located 470 kilometres from the city of Guwahati and just 6 km from the border of Arunachal Pradesh.
